channel.title: Looking for developers and beta testers
channel.description:
As the title suggests Renatus 718 is looking for developers and beta testers. Currently, there are two people including myself that are working on this.
First, a little bit about the server and what we have already:
A [B]fully [/B]functional, [B]ready[/B] for release, server source. [B]Two[/B] 8gb VPS. One for the server, one for the website & forum (the domain and server expenses are and always will be paid for by me). Licensed version of IPB, with IP. Nexus and IP. Content
(The thread will be updated with server features tomorrow)
----
Currently, we need somebody to maintain, and design the webclient/forum/website, as well as work on the Client. In return you will be given an in-game and forum rank according to how you contribute to the server.
[B]Application Form[/B]: [CODE] [B]Name: [/B] [B]Age: [/B] [B]Skype Name: [/B] [B]What are you applying for? (Web/Java/Beta-Tester): [/B] [B]What experience do you have? (Not needed for Beta Tester): [/B] [B]Why should we pick you?: [/B] [/CODE]
Even if you do not plan on applying, thank you for reading this thread.
PS. Most if not ALL beta testers will be accepted.

item.title: Looking for developers and beta testers
item.dc:creator: @Snackman Snackman
item.description:
@Snackman wrote:

Name: Jordy
Age: 17
Skype Name: dutchphoenix
What are you applying for? (Web/Java/Beta-Tester): Beta Tester
What experience do you have? (Not needed for Beta Tester): -
Why should we pick you?: I’ve got about 2 - 2.5 years experience coding servers (several revisions), and about 6 years of playing them. I can contribute in multiple ways, I can also be a back-up developer if one leaves

Read full topic
item.source: Looking for developers and beta testers

item.title: Looking for developers and beta testers
item.dc:creator: @ViciousVike ViciousVike
item.description:
@ViciousVike wrote:

Name: Austin
Age: 17
Skype Name: Troutseason
What are you applying for? (Web/Java/Beta-Tester): Beta-Tester/Java
What experience do you have? (Not needed for Beta Tester): I have 5 months of Java experience, I’m knowledgeable in RSPS. I think I could be a great addition to your team.
Why should we pick you?: I would contribute vastly to your server to ensure it’s bug-free and highly customized to the owner’s wishes.

Read full topic

item.title: Looking for developers and beta testers

item.description:
@Anxtrist wrote:

As the title suggests Renatus 718 is looking for developers and beta testers. Currently, there are two people including myself that are working on this.

First, a little bit about the server and what we have already:

A fully functional, ready for release, server source.
Two 8gb VPS. One for the server, one for the website & forum (the domain and server expenses are and always will be paid for by me).
Licensed version of IPB, with IP. Nexus and IP. Content

(The thread will be updated with server features tomorrow)

Currently, we need somebody to maintain, and design the webclient/forum/website, as well as work on the Client. In return you will be given an in-game and forum rank according to how you contribute to the server.
